attributes.action: make Child Benefit means tested or to abolish it altogether and replace it with Family Credit payments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under the current system Child Benefit is paid indiscriminately to parents no matter how high their income.
Child benefit should be means tested so that the taxpayer is not burdened with funding families that are potentially wealthier than themself. 

If the administrative costs of means testing are prohibitive, then Child Benefit should be abolished and extra funding provided for Family Credit payments, so that money is redirected where it is genuinly needed.
